title: Stella
content: Elixir library providing implementations of the most famous algorithms, data structures and math functions.

title: Angotia World Creator
content: Tool for game developers or World Creators to creating fully functionally 2D game maps and characters.

title: Angotia Catalogs
content: Tool for game developers and users to help them find information such as maps, quests etc. Includes Admin Panel to manage exported data from Angotia tools.

title: Bread Hunter 4
content: Bread Hunter 4 is arcade game where u need to be as speed as u can, catch all breds and don't be catched by Katl cashier!

title: Poyters
content: Single page application created in Angular with possibility to create Poyters Account - gives access to private Poyters products.

title: HIPER JUMPER 3000
content: HIPER JUMPER 3000 arcade game with hand-coded physic engine and map creator.

title: Space newcomers
content: Space newcomers is Poyters version of famous game - Space Invaders created by Taito Corporation in 1978.

title: Kostek 'Birthday'
content: Kostek 'Birthday' is a comedy game where nothingis predictable. Just join it and make laugh!
